mapper.sql: a.ori_card_id AS oriCardId, a.new_card_id AS newCardId, a.personnel_id AS personnelId, a.pay_price AS payPrice, a.supply_remarks AS supplyRemarks, a.flag, a.is_using AS isUsing, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.create_user_name AS createUserName, a.update_user_name AS updateUserName, a.CustomerCode, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, a.update_user_id AS updateUserId, a.external_no AS externalNo, a.client_id AS clientId, a.status, a.audit_status AS auditStatus, a.status_user_id AS statusUserId, a.audit_user_id AS auditUserId, a.type, a.ori_card_no AS oriCardNo, a.new_card_no AS newCardNo, a.card_name AS cardName, a.card_flag AS cardFlag, a.invalid_time AS invalidTime, a.card_opening AS cardOpening, a.replacement_card AS replacementCard, a.order_state AS orderState, a.order_info_id AS orderInfoId, a.bind_time AS bindTime, a.new_card_num_id AS newCardNumId, a.id
mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT cf.service_life FROM fr_card_type cf WHERE cf.id = (SELECT fo.card_type_id FROM fr_card_order_info fo WHERE fo.id = a.order_info_id )) serviceLife, (SELECT fo.total_price FROM fr_card_order_info fo WHERE fo.id = a.order_info_id ) totalPrice, (SELECT fo.buy_rights_num FROM fr_card_order_info fo WHERE fo.id = a.order_info_id ) buyRightsNum, (SELECT fo.give_rights_num FROM fr_card_order_info fo WHERE fo.id = a.order_info_id ) giveRightsNum, (SELECT p.RelName FROM PersonnelInfo p WHERE a.personnel_id = p.id AND p.IsDel = 0) personnerlName, (SELECT STUFF((SELECT ','+ltrim(cast( CASE WHEN pay_mode =1 THEN '支付宝' WHEN pay_mode =2 THEN '刷卡' WHEN pay_mode =3 THEN '微信' WHEN pay_mode =4 THEN '现金' WHEN pay_mode =5 THEN '转账' WHEN pay_mode =6 THEN '花呗' WHEN pay_mode =7 THEN '其他' ELSE '未设置' END as varchar(10))+':'+cast(pay_price as varchar(10))) FROM fr_card_order_pay_mode WHERE order_id = a.id and order_type ='4' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS keyword FROM fr_card_order_pay_mode t WHERE t.order_id = a.id GROUP BY t.order_id, t.order_type ) paymentMoney,
FROM fr_card_supply_record a WHERE a.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND a.client_id = #{clientId} AND a.type = #{type}
SELECT SUM(b.pay_price) FROM fr_card_supply_record a LEFT JOIN fr_card_order_pay_mode b ON a.id = b.order_id WHERE a.client_id = #{clientId} AND a.type = 1

SELECT (SELECT p.RelName FROM PersonnelInfo p WHERE a.personnel_id = p.id) personnelName, (SELECT p.buy_rights_num FROM fr_card_order_info p WHERE a.order_info_id = p.id) buyRightsNum, (SELECT (p.buy_rights_num + p.give_rights_num) FROM fr_card_order_info p WHERE a.order_info_id = p.id) haveRightsNum, (SELECT p.discount_num FROM fr_card_order_info p WHERE a.order_info_id = p.id) discountNum, (SELECT STUFF((SELECT ','+ltrim(cast( CASE WHEN pay_mode =1 THEN '支付宝' WHEN pay_mode =2 THEN '刷卡' WHEN pay_mode =3 THEN '微信' WHEN pay_mode =4 THEN '现金' WHEN pay_mode =5 THEN '转账' WHEN pay_mode =6 THEN '花呗' WHEN pay_mode =7 THEN '其他' ELSE '未设置' END as varchar(10))+':'+cast(pay_price as varchar(10))) FROM fr_card_order_pay_mode WHERE order_id = a.order_info_id and order_type ='2' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS keyword FROM fr_card_order_pay_mode t WHERE t.order_id = a.order_info_id GROUP BY t.order_id, t.order_type ) paymentMoney,
FROM fr_card_supply_record a WHERE a.is_using='1' AND a.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND a.client_id = #{clientId} AND a.new_card_id = #{newCardId}
